name: From folding hype to multivariate setting rescue. A 2023 lookback
description:
Take
 a leap through time in this thought-provoking talk, 'From folding hype 
to multivariate setting rescue: A 2023 Lookback.' Uncover the evolution 
of folding-schemes, its impact on snarks, and how the multivariate 
setting has emerged reshaping the landscape of snark-based proofs and cryptographic protocols.

speakers.name: CPerezz
speakers.bio:
Working on privacy and ZKP since 2018.
Member of the PSE team since 2020.
